lead_paragraph: The Giants named Marc Ross as their director of college scouting yesterday, filling a vacancy created when Jerry Reese was promoted to general manager in January. Ross, 34, was 27 when the Eagles made him the N.F.L.’s youngest college scouting director in December 2000. He spent the past three seasons as the national college scout for the Buffalo Bills.
